studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Updated visit headers and footnotes to include Week 3.

studyAmendmentImpacts.affectedSection: Section 10.6 - Appendix 6: Liver and other safety
studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Incorporated liver function test monitoring guidance previously held in the study manual.

studyAmendmentImpacts.affectedSection: Section 10.8 - Appendix 8A: Examples of drugs with a potential to change SAR442168 metabolism
studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Updated co-medication guidance, specifically regarding CYP3A and CYP2C8 interactions.
Added new section for US, Brazil, and Israel regarding FDA partial clinical hold conditions and prohibited inhibitors.
Reformatted existing content, updated table of contents, and minor editorial changes.

studyAmendmentReasons.reasonText: Include liver function test monitoring guidance previously in the study manual
Update the co-medication guidance as per Health Authority request
Correction of error regarding modafinil classification (weak vs moderate CYP3A inducer)
Updated guidance for CYP inhibitors/inducers based on information from DDI study
Update in accordance with Sponsor’s standards

studyChanges.afterText: Week 3 added in the visit header and in footnote ‘l’
studyChanges.summary: Added Week 3 to the Schedule of Activities.

studyChanges.afterText: Refer to the drug label for metabolic interactions
studyChanges.summary: Removed external website reference for drug interactions.

studyChanges.beforeText: modafinil in the list of moderate CYP3A inducers
studyChanges.afterText: modafinil removed from moderate list (weak inducer)
studyChanges.summary: Corrected classification of modafinil to allow its use.

studyChanges.beforeText: rifabutin in the list of potent CYP3A inducers
studyChanges.afterText: rifabutin moved to the list of moderate CYP3A inducers
studyChanges.summary: Updated rifabutin classification based on DDI study data.

studyChanges.afterText: Prohibited use of CYP3A and CYP2C8 inhibitors and restriction of grapefruit/grapefruit juice
studyChanges.summary: Added specific prohibitions for sites following FDA partial clinical hold.
